hero.title: profile
hero.subtitle: more about me
hero.description: Born and raised in Piteå, Norrbotten County. Since 2016, I have been living in Stockholm and currently deepening my skills as a Frontend Developer with a focus on web security at Jensen Vocational College in Kista. Belonging to the FWK23S class, I am expected to complete my education in the summer of 2025. My lifelong interest in computers has been a driving force that now leads me toward a career in a field that I find both extremely fascinating and interesting. I am seeking an internship from the fall of 2024 for a period of six months to further deepen my knowledge and gain practical experience.

personal.education1: I began my journey towards a new career field in 2021, and since then I have studied at adult education and taken many subjects in computer & network technology, programming and web development, as well as English, Swedish, and mathematics.
personal.education2: In 2023, I was admitted to Jensen Vocational College in the Frontend Developer program focusing on web security. I enjoy this field immensely as I have always had a great interest in computers and find it very easy to learn new things that I find interesting.
personal.freetime: In my free time, I spend most of my days in front of one of my computers, trying to learn new things in web development, both in frontend and backend. I also explore other programming languages like Python and tools like Photoshop, as well as different operating systems, which takes up almost all of my free time.
personal.mylove: In my life, I have my wonderful wife, who always stands by my side and has encouraged me to start studying again so that I can have the opportunity to work with something I enjoy and find interesting. We also have a wonderful little dog named Flash, and we are soon expecting our first child together.

project.title: Projects
project.description: Explore some of my projects by clicking on the links below. Additionally, more projects are available on my GitHub profile for a more comprehensive overview of my portfolio. There you can follow my development journey and take part in my projects, noting that many of my projects are ongoing and I work on them as time permits.

resume.description: Frontend Development student with a focus on web security. Completed two out of four semesters of my education. Possesses a solid understanding of HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, React, NodeJS & MySQL. Driven by a constant pursuit of personal development, which is evident in my self-studies and projects. Additional skills acquired through several courses in data & network technology at adult education, and I have a lifelong interest in computers, networks, gaming & components.
